document.full_text: more than 400,000 women are raped in the democratic republic of congo every year, according to a study by u.s. researchers published wednesday, but the united nations has expressed doubt over the findings.
document.title: nearly half million women raped in congo yearly: study
lines_and_colors: more than 400,000 women are raped in the democratic republic of congo every year, according to a study by u.s. researchers published wednesday, but the united nations has expressed doubt over the findings.
